title: Accueil et installation des participants
description: Inscription et récupération de badges

title: Photo de famille + Pause déjeuner
description: Moment restaurationnnnnnnnnnnn!

title: Mot de fin + Cocktail
description: Yes!!! we did it!!!!!!!

title: Morning coffee
description: Coffeeeeeee!

title: Lancement du GDG DevFest Abidjan 2015
description: Début officiel de la conférence. Mots de bienvenue des organisateurs, sponsors et partenaires.

title: Conference closing and contest winners announcements
description: Make sure you won't miss closing ceremony, all gifts from out sponsors and partners will find their owners during this session.

title: Microcontroleurs : Application à la robotique
description: Programmer un microcontrolleur pour allumer une LED ,Programmer un robot mobile avec un MICROCONTROLLEUR , Programmer un robot qui évite des obstacles et un robot danseur .

title: Microcontroleurs : Application à la robotique
description: Venez apprendre à Programmer un microcontrolleur pour allumer une LED ,Programmer un robot mobile avec un MICROCONTROLLEUR , Programmer un robot qui évite des obstacles et un robot danseur .

title: Planning Android Screens
description: This talks is about Android UX when building new screen from scratch. We will go through some common Android screens (like Login / Sign Up / Search / etc.) and see what issues you can face, how popular apps are solving them and what are our options. At the end I will show how to plan & prototype animations with Pixate Studio.

title: Power of Android Shell
description:
Android provides a set of not really well documented command line tools that are mainly used by system engineers for debugging and testing purposes. Available after entering 'adb shell', these tools can give you a lot of details about what is happening in the system and help with automation.

We'll see what is available in Android command line and
- analyze system and sample apps with 'dumpsys',
- find out how to check whether your service finishes normally and does not live forever,
- mock battery level and charger state,
- trigger account sychronization,
- change system settings without a single line of UiAutomator code.

title: Hijacking notification actions - lets respond to your messages!
description:
Always wanted to implement automatic answer to your text messages/FB Messenger/Telegram and didn't want to implement whole client for this?

Wanted to call some action in any notification from your app without too much permissions (or root access)?

Here we go! I will show and explain how to hijack actions from any visible notification to any other app.

title: Functional Programming on Android with Kotlin
description: Presentation de la programmation fonctionnel et du langage kotlin. Avec les participants nous developperons une application Android avec Kotlin

title: Angular2: Reasoning behind technical decisions
description: Angular 2.0 is the next generation of platform that allows to develop complex web application with a blazing speed and simplicity. But for many developers, even those who have lot of Angular1 experience, there are still a lot of questions why Angular team decided to use TypeScript, strange templating syntax and other not very obvious decisions. During this talk we’ll try to give answers to these questions and dive little bit deeper in Angular 2.0 architecture.

title: V8 under the hood
description: What is happening inside V8 javascript engine - optimization, work, etc.

title: L'environnement connecté
description: Présentation d'objets connectés qui interagissent avec le mobile grâce à la technologie BLE

title: New security model in Marshmallow
description:
Permissions on Android have always been an important area to consider when developing applications. Currently, users have awareness of these permissions, but no real control over them.

Android M comes with several breaking changes, related to Permissions.

In this presentation we will learn on how the new permission model introduced in Android M works, and how can we educate our users, so they can understand why are we asking for certain permission.

title: Du brainstorming à l'innovation...
description: Présentation d'une technique pour trouver des idées et innover!

title: Build extraordinary Apps with Firebase
description: Créer des applications Web et mobiles qui stockent et synchronisent les données en temps réel avec Firebase.Ceci en mode connecté et déconnecté avec une reprise automatique de la synchronisation.

title: Continuous Delivery with Ease
description: Do you create builds for your client frequently? Maybe every day? That’s good, because you can get feedback early and often… unless you do that manually, pushing APKs via mail or to some app testing platform via browser. Look back at the time spent on these tedious tasks. How would you feel if you could spend less time and do even more at the same time? I will show you, how easy it is to set things up, not to spend even a minute a day to create builds for your testers. We will look at all the requirements for that and we will go as far as enabling business people to decide when to publish new version of your amazing application literally with a push of a button.

title: Let's play JHipster!
description: Live coding sur les possibilités du framework jhipster!!!

title: Présentation de polymer
description: présentation du framework de développement universel polymer

title: Digital Marketing 101 : Adwords/Adsense
description: Session 'awareness' à titre informatif sur les possibilités de Adwords pour les professionnels qui souhaitent se lancer dans le digital marketing, aussi tous ceux qui veulent ajouter une nouvelle palette de compétences; et sur les possibilités de Adsense pour les créateurs de contenu YouTube, Blogger ou autre site web.

title: Entrepreneuriat et Développeurs Android Africain
description: Entrepreneuriat et Développeurs Android Africain est un thème qui m'a été inspiré en observant l'écosystème des développeurs Android africain en général et Ivoirien en particulier. Mon constat est que nous avons des compétences,mais nous sommes mal canalisés. Dans ce thème, je parlerai d'entreprenariat, couplet caractéristiques développeurs puis une léçon à suivre.

title: Service Worker - Native Apps Experience For The Web
description: Installing and updating apps, network interceptors and full cache management, push notifications and background updates. All these is now possible in Web apps with Service Worker! Even when the App is closed. Excited? Be the one to touch it first!

title: Google WebRTC on Mobile
description: WebRTC is a new milestone in the evolution of the web. This technology allows us to quickly create real-time communication applications. Altough its main target is web browsers, WebRTC is becoming a popular real time communication technology used on mobile. By using WebRTC you can develop your own peer-to-peer video chat in a short amount of time. Also, WebRTC is very flexible, you can make calls to another networks that using offer/answer model, for example SIP protocol. In this presentation you can gain in-depth insights about how to implement WebRTC on iOS and Android mobile devices for a native experience.

title: Applications mobiles avec AngularJs et Ionic
description: Dans cette session vous saurez comment developper une application mobile avec les technologie web utilisant le javascript. Nous verrons aussi comment a partir de ces technologie on peut avoir une meme experience utilisateur qu'avec les applications developpez de manière native

title: [Keynote] Quoi de neuf chez Google?
description: Découvrez les nouveautés de Google avec nos trois seakers présents au dernier I/O

title: Google Solve for X comes to Ukraine
description:
The world is not limited by IQ. We are limited by creativity and bravery. - Astro Teller

Learn about the new GDG-powered exciting Google initiative in Ukraine! It is called Solve for X and is a project of a mysterious division Google [x] Lab, (which is at the moment a separate project in the Alphabet holding). Would you like to join the global projects changing the world? - Solve for X is the answer!

Learn about the first Ukrainian experience and find out how to participate in a Moonshot Sprint in your city.

The brave and creative - we are looking for you!

title: Solving Dev / Test conflicts
description:
In the ideal world, developers and testers act as a single solid team with a common goal. In reality, there is a number of problems that can create a split between these leagues, and even start a tiny cold war.

We'll try to look into some tricky questions.
- How can we detect the split at the earliest stage?
- What can we do to prevent it?
- If we have already faced it, how can we heal it?

title: Material Design in Games
description:
1. Why people play the games?
2. Games in Material Design
3. Developing of character
4. Why Material Design is actual today?

title: How to succeed in the kids and family mobile app space
description: Learn how successful kids and family app developers understand and engage their audiences, and how you can design high-quality apps just for this group. You'll also get practical tips to help you boost your reach, retention or revenue.

title: Women cracking the code
description: For last several years the number of girls in IT sphere is actively increasing. In general girls in IT is not a myth, but still number of girls working as software developers, having original ideas or creating own startups is a tiny. Probably the reason is that profession of software developer requires a set of specific analytical skills, creative approach to any problems and ability to lifelong learn. During the talk we will discuss how to improve listed qualities and make a successful career in IT.

title: RxJava for Android
description: Presentation de la librairie Equilibre , RxJava et Retrolambda pour developper des applications Android Reactive pendant un livecode

title: Data Binding. Next big thing?
description: What Android Data Binding is? How it will change Android development? And the main question - will it be the next big thing or just yet another framework? Lets try to find out answers to all these questions and take a closer look to Data Binding.

title: The Cloud Convergence: OpenStack and Kubernetes
description:
The new cloud era brings us a lot of different technologies and products that can make process of development easier.

On the one hand we have OpenStack - an Open Source product that provides you a possibility to deploy your own cloud. On the other hand - Google, with its extensive experience operating a cloud using container technology, developed the open source Kubernetes orchestration system to manage containerized applications in a clustered environment.

This presentation will show you how to manage Containers easily using Kubernetes system on the OpenStack cloud environment.

title: How to become a Google Developer Expert
description: TBD

title: Tips to succeed in IT career
description:
How to prepare to the interview? What is important in the resume?

When you start a career that a questions everyone is strugling with. During the session we'll talk about best practices in creating resume, differences in applying for a job in product and outsorce companies.

title: Fireside Chat
description: In this informal session we would like to sit by the virtual fireplace and give you the possibility to ask any question to various speakers and sponsors on the fireside panel. If we are just staring at each other the moderator will put an extra woodblock on the fire by posing a taunting statement with the intention to heat up the discussion to a passionate debate. We give away great swag for people contributing to a great conversation.
